overview: Ginger Lynn is one lucky lady. She is a very classy, naughty and an exhibitionist on her spare time. A day in the life would consist of juggling several hard working husbands and making them all feel as if they are the only one. However, Randy West doesn't give in so easily and Ginger has to come up with an amusing way to catch his attention. See her in furs, silks, diamonds and nine hot scenes; see them all come off.
tagline: See her in furs. Silks. Diamonds. And in nine hot scenes, see them all come off.
title: Gentlemen Prefer Ginger
